SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '8'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '8'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '9'

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                                    SET goods_number = goods_number - 1
                                    WHERE goods_id = 66

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=35

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '72' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '12'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '12'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                                    SET goods_number = goods_number - 1
                                    WHERE goods_id = 21

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7219571b39a8e1fcba7fadf16aeaf047'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7219571b39a8e1fcba7fadf16aeaf047'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7219571b39a8e1fcba7fadf16aeaf047'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '289' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '13'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '290' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '290' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '291' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '291' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                SET goods_number = goods_number + 0,
                    last_update = '1401348718'
                WHERE goods_id = '11'

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f2ffbe7ee777d593e5c698980b4da34'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '293' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '293' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '53' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '14'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=9
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f5019b2057052ee92de80ac1d7e2f841'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '70c5479b6b16d28df1844b6b38444586'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f5019b2057052ee92de80ac1d7e2f841'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f5019b2057052ee92de80ac1d7e2f841'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '70c5479b6b16d28df1844b6b38444586'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '70c5479b6b16d28df1844b6b38444586'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '294' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f5019b2057052ee92de80ac1d7e2f841'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=11

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=11
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '33c22b3f300a54d3099ef50516db45bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '33c22b3f300a54d3099ef50516db45bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '296' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -2
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '295' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '302' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '30191cf795b8d5c71c948072aedb5e65'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '30191cf795b8d5c71c948072aedb5e65'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '305' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e64984db8b1f6fced6a7577df7a0e225'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e64984db8b1f6fced6a7577df7a0e225'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '311' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '311' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e4ea4de135ad006e44e9884f207bf16c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e4ea4de135ad006e44e9884f207bf16c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '319' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '15'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '15'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7954fa5ea1755a40a63f764ae2535c0e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7954fa5ea1755a40a63f764ae2535c0e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '326' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '329' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=25

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=11
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2c67b4ecdd331d70524aed5e7db23ab4'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2c67b4ecdd331d70524aed5e7db23ab4'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '334' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '299' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=11
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'dbe35d30cff51b3f490548c793406057'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'dbe35d30cff51b3f490548c793406057'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '338' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -2
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '341' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'a7076a1eced7c96ea8ef620d66048b77'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'a7076a1eced7c96ea8ef620d66048b77'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '343' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '85d0d00f6bb9c194bd44c7f0430c85f4'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '85d0d00f6bb9c194bd44c7f0430c85f4'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '85d0d00f6bb9c194bd44c7f0430c85f4'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '344' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -2
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '344' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '0f84b9cb8d918a2ea38cfc0c7baaf75e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '0f84b9cb8d918a2ea38cfc0c7baaf75e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '0f84b9cb8d918a2ea38cfc0c7baaf75e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '0f84b9cb8d918a2ea38cfc0c7baaf75e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '347' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '347' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7d52ac983526c70c0375165cf6493e3b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7d52ac983526c70c0375165cf6493e3b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7d52ac983526c70c0375165cf6493e3b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7d52ac983526c70c0375165cf6493e3b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '348' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '348' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '6e940280f58df603a566185214171eed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '6e940280f58df603a566185214171eed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '6e940280f58df603a566185214171eed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '6e940280f58df603a566185214171eed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '351' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '351' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '813b9378e80537bbe6a825de4b10ef9a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '813b9378e80537bbe6a825de4b10ef9a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '352' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '15'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '16'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '16'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '73' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '17'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '17'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '10' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '18'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '18'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '355' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c7d918e5e9019f62f5fdce664d22736b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c7d918e5e9019f62f5fdce664d22736b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c7d918e5e9019f62f5fdce664d22736b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c7d918e5e9019f62f5fdce664d22736b'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '359' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '22'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '352' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '15'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '360' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '10' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '19'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '19'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '20'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '21'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=74
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '54851fede7ea6904737963ff340e71b2'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '54851fede7ea6904737963ff340e71b2'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '362' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '362' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '22'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '4' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 6
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'ca6fd5b9874c9edbe49502e51593a339'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '363' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '366' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc9469741bd500f11b1de473f6498fed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc9469741bd500f11b1de473f6498fed'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '382' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -3
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'cd840b20a605b70eaee1419210a27e56'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'cd840b20a605b70eaee1419210a27e56'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '385' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '23'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '23'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'cf53dba7303b7d58e266c77b7cc9fa84'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '398' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

                SET goods_number = goods_number + 50,
                    last_update = '1401869867'

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '400' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '24'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '24'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        AND DG.delivery_id = '29'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '30'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '30'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=74
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'deab6305ee059a31375532db2a2ede22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'deab6305ee059a31375532db2a2ede22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'deab6305ee059a31375532db2a2ede22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'deab6305ee059a31375532db2a2ede22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'deab6305ee059a31375532db2a2ede22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '405' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '405' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '407' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '409' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '8'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '411' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '418' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '418' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e306b0490402e3b9affe4d3c6b078785'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e306b0490402e3b9affe4d3c6b078785'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e306b0490402e3b9affe4d3c6b078785'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'e306b0490402e3b9affe4d3c6b078785'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '70' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '31'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '32'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '33'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '33'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '34'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '70' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'a3d9d290607d43c3d7be32ac22f5476c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'a3d9d290607d43c3d7be32ac22f5476c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '422' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '70'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '49'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '432' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '49'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '444' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '446' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '59'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '10' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc8a4da8f5d89f57d5cab6e61d3c8aff'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc8a4da8f5d89f57d5cab6e61d3c8aff'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc8a4da8f5d89f57d5cab6e61d3c8aff'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '461' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -2
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 2
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '176d0b79f46ea1c16fdd258c89d933b6'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '176d0b79f46ea1c16fdd258c89d933b6'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '463' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '469' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=11
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '86e0b614d205a0abfc0ab5255f3b7be7'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '86e0b614d205a0abfc0ab5255f3b7be7'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '496' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '501' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '10' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '39'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '39'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '502' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '503' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '40'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '40'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'a951be497189e3806a0609a76612d886'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '514' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '514' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '525' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '525' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=74
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '52'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '54'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '54'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '55'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '53'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '56'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '528' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '57'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '57'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '58'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '534' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '62'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '62'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '63'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '64'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '542' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '65'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '66'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '90'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=4
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '4' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7fc8a3970dadab748dd00f4e91c61b63'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7fc8a3970dadab748dd00f4e91c61b63'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '546' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '91'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '558' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '37' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1b11057c6f683e8d9723dffb198eb064'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1b11057c6f683e8d9723dffb198eb064'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '564' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '575' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '603' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '603' and u.user_id=o.user_id

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
