SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '60' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '103'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '103'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '104'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '104'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '105'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '105'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '607' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c825bbfea63ae07e5ef7f1304ddbd233'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c825bbfea63ae07e5ef7f1304ddbd233'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '612' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '70'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '612' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '70'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '615' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '106'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '106'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '626' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '66' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '038f151180a9584b4313e8250590812a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '038f151180a9584b4313e8250590812a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '627' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '628' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '628' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '107'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '637' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '3ece59a3c236edf01f1986f7d92c4a91'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '3ece59a3c236edf01f1986f7d92c4a91'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '641' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -3
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                SET goods_number = goods_number + -198,
                    last_update = '1402985658'
                WHERE goods_id = '76'

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '118'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '118'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '649' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '128'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '128'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '652' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2f4cd4725e7b59a4b4165a657a2bbfbd'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '657' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '657' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '140'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

            LIMIT 1
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '148'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '148'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '76' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '580bb0b795573def2172bf33a4a8fa56'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '689' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '4'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '8' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '163'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '163'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '164'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '164'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '28' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'ff7f08614db67d0392a2a63dd1f5ec3e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '699' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '165'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '165'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                SET goods_number = goods_number + 20,
                    last_update = '1403232576'
                WHERE goods_id = '10'

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '166'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '728' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '728' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

111
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '170'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '170'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1edd1195cea01b9f10f67cbcba9316bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1edd1195cea01b9f10f67cbcba9316bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1edd1195cea01b9f10f67cbcba9316bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1edd1195cea01b9f10f67cbcba9316bc'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '734' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '751' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '751' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f0f9958db8198ce129c98489d40dc83'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f0f9958db8198ce129c98489d40dc83'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f0f9958db8198ce129c98489d40dc83'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '757' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '68'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '764' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '176'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'de4d6d6160d2412fc43a05342166166c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'de4d6d6160d2412fc43a05342166166c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '786' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '49'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '76'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '177'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '177'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '178'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '01f86b305af3aff9ebe3a00d8e9e539c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '01f86b305af3aff9ebe3a00d8e9e539c'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '808' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'ee95b837e63e166dc4ce9fafc6d58777'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'ee95b837e63e166dc4ce9fafc6d58777'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'ee95b837e63e166dc4ce9fafc6d58777'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '811' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '75'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '12' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '12' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '730cae125da943c7cba897e2cf57832e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '730cae125da943c7cba897e2cf57832e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '730cae125da943c7cba897e2cf57832e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '730cae125da943c7cba897e2cf57832e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '730cae125da943c7cba897e2cf57832e'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '826' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '12'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '827' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '12'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '646' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '179'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '179'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2e33a1ca3c5c2dc610b95487d7023172'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2e33a1ca3c5c2dc610b95487d7023172'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2e33a1ca3c5c2dc610b95487d7023172'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2e33a1ca3c5c2dc610b95487d7023172'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '840' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '79' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '134'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '180'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '181'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '840' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 2
            WHERE goods_id = '79'

        AND DG.delivery_id = '187'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

        AND DG.delivery_id = '188'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f60047d68703e6f043d49ed2b211341d'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '843' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'f60047d68703e6f043d49ed2b211341d'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '844' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '189'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '190'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '72' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '14' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '202'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '202'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=9

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '3b74b4080e7caef6dd02b1ffa72decc1'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '3b74b4080e7caef6dd02b1ffa72decc1'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '860' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '75'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '860' and u.user_id=o.user_id

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '75'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '78' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=78
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '78' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '869' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1c46ccd8222a1c57771a5d4d19e64953'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '1c46ccd8222a1c57771a5d4d19e64953'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '870' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '876' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '37' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '203'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '204'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '204'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '218'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '219'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '219'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '10'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
                SET goods_number = goods_number + 1,
                    last_update = '1403918897'
                WHERE goods_id = '10'
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '220'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '221'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '221'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '222'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '226'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '227'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '800' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '228'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '229'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '930' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c812b6c9c0045b1c184ebbbf26e8db05'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c812b6c9c0045b1c184ebbbf26e8db05'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '931' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '232'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '232'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '233'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '234'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '243'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '243'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '74' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '961' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '81'
            LIMIT 1

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '258'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '258'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '259'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '259'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '82' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b54b9ba97fb0e9b5887730cd11e6a34a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b54b9ba97fb0e9b5887730cd11e6a34a'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '963' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '957' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '80'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '963' and u.user_id=o.user_id

        AND DG.delivery_id = '267'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '269'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '269'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '966' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '271'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '271'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '692ea3fbaafd8fc1d0da2f8cca817562'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '982' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '81' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '268'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '268'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '275'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '989' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '282'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '283'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '81'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '59' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '16e9689704cedc66efc62f1ae660af06'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '16e9689704cedc66efc62f1ae660af06'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '16e9689704cedc66efc62f1ae660af06'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1002' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '80'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '20' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '284'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '284'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '289'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '289'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '82' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '290'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '290'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '92ac338d702849cd865b86157a214502'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1013' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '9' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c5d9501d294683d4c040eb418305dd50'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c5d9501d294683d4c040eb418305dd50'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'c5d9501d294683d4c040eb418305dd50'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '5fd00a572513a9aa1564870c6b0031d7'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '5fd00a572513a9aa1564870c6b0031d7'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1016' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1016' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1014' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '66'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1036' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '293'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '293'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '7a0dea8e14a79d5cbafe2448856476c9'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1063' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -3
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1062' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1063' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '301'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '301'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1084' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '339' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '40'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '24' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '38'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '38' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '308'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '308'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '309'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '309'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '310'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '310'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '311'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '311'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '312'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '312'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '313'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '314'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
