SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b576eb29288cb4d283ef09ad3bfffa33'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b576eb29288cb4d283ef09ad3bfffa33'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b576eb29288cb4d283ef09ad3bfffa33'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'b576eb29288cb4d283ef09ad3bfffa33'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1104' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '23' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '321'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '321'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '322'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '8caef6d587383c2b952e336afc87d3b9'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '8caef6d587383c2b952e336afc87d3b9'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1113' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '9'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '84' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '325'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '325'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9216eedbea92743195f69776d64e8cfe'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9216eedbea92743195f69776d64e8cfe'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1118' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '84'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '63' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1120' and u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '326'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '327'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1127' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '66' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '344'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '344'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '345'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '345'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '346'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '346'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '347'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '347'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '81' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

mobile_SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `hlkl`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '11' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '2d302c1fcebb7c1a32af40a1e4d80b22'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1134' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '11'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1134' and u.user_id=o.user_id

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '353'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id 
SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, G.goods_number, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '353'
        GROUP BY DG.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '6388cc9881008dc1e04c0d8129b9c552'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1138' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '77'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_sn, o.consignee, o.address, o.tel, o.shipping_id, o.extension_code, o.extension_id, o.goods_amount,o.integral,u.user_name FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_info` AS o, `hlkl`.`ecs_users` AS u  WHERE o.order_id = '1138' and u.user_id=o.user_id

        AND DG.delivery_id = '367'

SELECT DG.goods_id, DG.is_real, DG.product_id, SUM(DG.send_number) AS sums, IF(DG.product_id > 0, P.product_number, G.goods_number) AS storage, G.goods_name, DG.send_number
        FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_delivery_goods` AS DG, `hlkl`.`ecs_goods` AS G, `hlkl`.`ecs_products` AS P
        WHERE DG.goods_id = G.goods_id
        AND DG.delivery_id = '368'
        AND DG.product_id = P.product_id
        GROUP BY DG.product_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`hlkl`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '45e51e80de6b4f5423487f2a66049632'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `hlkl`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1141' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `hlkl`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '84'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= 'fc8196ebd32a2e5d218cdd2c1ed03637'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1140' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -10
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -20
            WHERE goods_id = '84'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1151' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1152' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '67'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 2
            WHERE goods_id = '81'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1153' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '69'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '74'
            LIMIT 1

            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1

            WHERE goods_id = '84'

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1154' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '84'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '488fffe47f368d1d96e8f0901adae7ff'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1155' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '73' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=78

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1155' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1158' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '83'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 3
            WHERE goods_id = '84'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE eg.is_exchange = 1 AND g.goods_id = '78' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9c3cbbcd95e5ad7dd68bafe7f5887156'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9c3cbbcd95e5ad7dd68bafe7f5887156'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9c3cbbcd95e5ad7dd68bafe7f5887156'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1166' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1166' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number + 1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '077c1d8de70297b454a18390cfb1af07'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '077c1d8de70297b454a18390cfb1af07'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0

SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1169' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '75'
            LIMIT 1

SELECT exchange_integral as integral FROM `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` WHERE goods_id=78

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE g.goods_id = '77' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f7692282de3241d58a82aa988b19143'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT SUM(eg.exchange_integral*c.goods_number) FROM `jftest`.`ecs_cart` AS c,`jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods`AS eg WHERE c.goods_id = eg.goods_id AND c.session_id= '9f7692282de3241d58a82aa988b19143'   AND c.rec_type = '4'   AND c.now_buy = 1 AND c.is_gift = 0 AND c.goods_id > 0 
SELECT goods_id, SUM(goods_number) AS num, MAX(extension_code) AS extension_code, product_id FROM `jftest`.`ecs_order_goods` WHERE order_id = '1174' AND is_real = 1 GROUP BY goods_id, product_id
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '77'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '78'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '80'
            LIMIT 1
UPDATE `jftest`.`ecs_goods`
            SET goods_number = goods_number -1
            WHERE goods_id = '81'
            LIMIT 1

            WHERE goods_id = '77'
            LIMIT 1

            WHERE goods_id = '78'

            WHERE goods_id = '80'
            LIMIT 1

            WHERE goods_id = '81'

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE eg.is_exchange = 1 AND g.goods_id = '53' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id

SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE eg.is_exchange = 1 AND g.goods_id = '49' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
SELECT g.*, c.measure_unit, b.brand_id, b.brand_name AS goods_brand, eg.exchange_integral, eg.is_exchange,eg.goods_price FROM `jftest`.`ecs_goods` AS g LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_exchange_goods` AS eg ON g.goods_id = eg.goods_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_category` AS c ON g.cat_id = c.cat_id LEFT JOIN `jftest`.`ecs_brand` AS b ON g.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE eg.is_exchange = 1 AND g.goods_id = '49' AND g.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY g.goods_id
